content.description: Easy but runout climbing from the base up to solid gear. Short.
content.protection: Clip the high bolt then gear until anchors. Shares anchors with The Ditch.
content.location: Left of Blockhead and The Ditch.

content.description: Lots of jugs throughout.  Could use cleaning as all holds are covered in lichen, but still large positive easy to find holds.
content.protection: Nuts, Hexes, .75-3 C4. Gear anchor and walk off top and go left to walk to base of crag.
content.location: In between Fred's Friendly Face and The Witch. Starts off in the wide crack behind the tree and then moves up and out.

content.description: Fun climbing crux is coming up and past 1st bolt can clip lip from below. Awkward moves through the crux.
Could bring a cam to protect in between first and second bolt if desired.
content.protection: 2 Bolts to a 2 Bolt anchor. Shares first bolt with Block Head.  Bring webbing if planning on setting up a TR.
content.location: Left route on East face of block.  Left of Block Head.

content.description: Hardest route at Maverick currently.
content.location: Only route on the South end of the block.

content.description: Fun face climbing.  High first bolt but easy climbing to first bolt.
content.protection: 2 Bolts, 2 Bolt anchor. If setting up a TR bring webbing because anchors are shared with Block Head and will shred rope on top edge of the block.
content.location: West side of the block route on the left.

content.description: Good beginner lead.
content.protection: 3 Bolts to a 2 Bolt anchor. Shares anchor with The Abortion.
content.location: Right of Move Um Out and The Abortion on South facing wall.

content.description: Muff Diver was so aptly named because of what it resembles. Sorry if it offends anyone, its just an observation. Its a fun somewhat overhung route with a lot of sharp cracks to wedge on the way up. You can use the reverse wall to rest at the top, but I wouldn't recommend it, as one girl we were with ended up getting herself wedged somehow and we had to hike up and around, tie off, and rap someone down next to her to push her out of the wedge...it was weird.
content.protection: No pro at all. Free-Solo it
content.location: You have to either down climb or take a hike around to climb down...unless you have already top roped the line to the right, at which when you top out you can clip in and rap down.

content.description: Positive pockets at the bottom into harder climbing up top.
content.protection: Bolts to a 2 Bolt anchor. Shares first bolt with Head Um Up.
content.location: Right of Head Um Up on East facing wall. Left of The Abortion.

content.description: Bad rope drag from top. Don't fall to left at bottom because risk hitting head on the block.
content.location: Leftmost route on the main wall right of the block.

content.description: Jugs
content.protection: 2 Bolts to a 2 Bolt anchor. Cams can ease the runout.

content.description: First route on the cliff.
content.location: Right of Jugarama #2 Left of Stiff Upper Lip.

content.description: Large holds to overhanging clip at chains.
content.location: Right of Stiff Upper Lip on small East facing wall.

content.description: Nice beginner lead.
content.location: Right of the Cherry Popper crack and Este Es.  Left of the Pure Sex crack.

content.description: This is the route farthest to the left.
Good first lead.
content.protection: 3 Bolts, 2 Bolt anchor shared with The Witch.
content.location: First bolted route left of the Blockhead Block.

content.description: This is a fun climb. Very easy, and great for beginner Trad leads.  Still needs some cleaning but holds are large and positive.
content.protection: Up to #3 C4.  Gear anchor that only placement is to traverse over on top ledge because crack ends and there are not bolted anchors. Walk off the top and around to the left to come back to the base.
content.location: In between Este Es and Fred's Friendly Face. There is a crack system that you can easily step into running up to a small overhang.  Go up and around to the ledge at the top.

content.description: Fun moves in shallow crack halfway up.
content.protection: 4 Bolts to a 2 Bolt anchor. Anchor shared with Reach for the Sky. Rap down due to sharp edges from anchor.
content.location: East side of the block on right.

content.description: Big ledges, if you're small you could squeeze through to the left from the second ledge.
content.protection: Mostly 1-2 size C4.  This shares anchors with Raw Hide
content.location: In between Raw Hide and Move 'Em Out on the right edge of the crag.

content.description: Sandstone Conglomerate. Very fun, lots of jugs, crimpers, cracks, and gastons.
